Title: Keanu
Actors: Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key, Tiffany Haddish, Method Man
Plot: When the adorable kitten of an L.A. crime kingpin unexpectedly enters the life of two cousins, they will have to go through tough gangs, pitiless hit-men, and ruthless drug dealers who all claim him, to get him back. How hard can it be?
